projectGridLines.title: Gen AI enabled command center for logistical operations
projectGridLines.description:
Description: We are offering an exciting opportunity for individuals who are passionate about artificial intelligence and its applications in the logistics industry. As a Junior General AI Developer, you will play a key role in leveraging AI technologies to enhance our logistics operations. You will have the opportunity to learn and contribute to the design, implementation, and optimization of advanced AI algorithms and systems that can operate autonomously and exhibit human-like cognitive abilities, thereby improving efficiency, accuracy, and decision-making in our logistics processes

  • Skill sets
  • Strong academic background with coursework or projects in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data science.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, or C++, along with experience with relevant AI frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, scikit-learn).
  • Excellent problem-solving skills, analytical thinking, and attention to detail.

Traits expectation:

  • Solid Mathematical Foundation
  • Problem-Solving Aptitude
  • Creativity and Innovation
  • Attention to Detail
  • Resilience and Adaptability
  • Expected learning: Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement in the logistics and technology sectors.
  • Exposure to cutting-edge AI technologies and real-world logistics challenges.
  • Dynamic and collaborative work environment with a focus on innovation and continuous learning.


Specific courses required for project execution:  AI, Machine learning, Python, Data structure and algorithm
